meaningMnemonic: It's <kanji>instant</kanji>ly <kanji>effect</kanji>ive! Sounds like something out of Pokemon. This word means <vocabulary>immediate effect</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>instant effect</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out for the shortening.
